Feedback.Question: Describe Timmy's feelings when he learned he would be trying out for the Braville Braves. Use evidence from the passage to support your answer.
Feedback.Answer: When Timmy learned he would be trying out for the Braville Braves, he was nervous but excited. The passage states, 'One day, the Braves announced tryouts. Timmy was nervous but excited.' This suggests that while he was anxious about the opportunity, he was also eager to fulfill his dream of joining the team.
